channel.title: Cwars ~317~
channel.description:
I've been working on coding a 317 server lately, and im having issues adding the timer for cwars... I've coded every object... I got the pwnscape source and it "had cwars" but no objects worked.... stairs didn't go up or down.. portals didn't teleport.. It was a freaking joke, but ive added pretty much added every aspect of cwars, the only thing i can't figure out is:
[size=20pt]HOW DO YOU ADD A TIMER! [/size] [size=15pt] ~A timer for the waiting lobby; ~A timer for the actual game itself; ~An interface that displays remaining time.[/size]
Also, i plan to release the source when im done with it, (cwars is probably the smallest thing i've done to the server).
So people be excited. The first 317 with working cwars(I THINK, IVE NEVER SEEN A 317 WITH WORKING CWARS!) and much more never before seen things [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2009, 03:50:43 pm[/size][hr]No one knows?

item.title: Cwars ~317~
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Declare an integer and use the process method to decrease it;

if(timer >= 1) { timer--; }

Read full topic

item.title: Cwars ~317~
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

Ehh you need to use the process for all of those things. Delta had a 317 with cwars but it caused alot of lag so he took it out.

Read full topic

I’ve been working on coding a 317 server lately, and im having issues adding the timer for cwars… I’ve coded every object… I got the pwnscape source and it “had cwars” but no objects worked… stairs didn’t go up or down… portals didn’t teleport… It was a freaking joke, but ive added pretty much added every aspect of cwars, the only thing i can’t figure out is:

~A timer for the actual game itself;
~An interface that displays remaining time.[/size]

Also, i plan to release the source when im done with it, (cwars is probably the smallest thing i’ve done to the server).

So people be excited. The first 317 with working cwars(I THINK, IVE NEVER SEEN A 317 WITH WORKING CWARS!) and much more never before seen things
